PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-11372011-09-29,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-4-GC-3 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate AO-3-GC-3)
PrecisOrder approving the issuance by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-4-GC-3, in order to approve the transfer and variance of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity AO-3-GC-3 to reflect the change of the owner and operator of the Aden Pipeline from Cenovus Border Pipelines Limited to SPUR BORDER PIPELINES LIMITED.
AttachmentsAttachment
